person.persName: John C. Betterworth (Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer and hatter)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer and hatter. Kentucky native. Married to Martha F. Jennings Betterworth in Anderson County on October 20, 1857. Hatter in Anderson County in 1850. Farmer in Anderson County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Anderson County in 1860. Farmer in Anderson County in 1863.
